settings.title: Image with text overlay
settings.text: Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select imagery and text that relates to your style and story.

Backyard Discovery is proud to partner with Roc Solid Foundation. For over a decade Roc Solid has been committed to building hope for kids fighting cancer by offering opportunities for them to do what they do best: PLAY. By providing playsets to families fighting pediatric cancer, Roc Solid Foundation helps to create a safe haven for play that represents an escape from the reality of their cancer battle. But most importantly these playsets signify hope for the future.

settings.subheading: CREATE LASTING MEMORIES WHILE PLAYING, RELAXING OR ENTERTAINING!

settings.title: Solid Engineering
settings.description: Our long-lasting gazebos aren’t an accident. They’re the result of a steadfast approach to using the best methods and materials.

settings.title: Fully Weatherproof
settings.description: Mother nature is unrelenting. That’s why we test and certify each of our gazebos’ ability to stand strong in snow, wind, and heat while always looking great doing it.

settings.title: Supported Assembly
settings.description: We make sure you have everything you need to get your gazebo up safely and start enjoying your new structure headache-free.

settings.jumbotron-rte: Most of our playsets, playhouses, and pergolas can be purchased with assembly included using our GoConfigure service. GoConfigure will get your family up and running (and playing) in no time.

settings.accordion_content_1: Our corporate offices are in Pittsburg, KS, about 20 miles NW of Joplin, MO where we also have R&D, Customer Service, Order Fulfilment, and Distribution. We also have design and minor manufacturing facilities in Siloam Springs, AR, and a major distribution center in Kansas City, MO. Our major manufacturing facilities are in China.
settings.accordion_title_2: Q: How long have you been in business?
settings.accordion_content_2: We have been manufacturing play sets for over 35 years. In 2007 we merged with the other large swing set manufacturer, Adventure play sets of Amarillo, TX. This made us the largest play set manufacturer in the US. We have been selling our sets to large retailers such as Wal-Mart, Sam's, Amazon, Home Depot, and Lowe's for years. We also manufacture a line of high end specialty play sets branded Backyard Adventures. These sets are modular and can be configured to your specifications and are sold through a nationwide dealer network.
settings.accordion_title_3: Q: Where can I buy your products?
settings.accordion_content_3: Our products are available through retailers around the US that include: Sam’s Clubs, Wal-Mart, Amazon, Wayfair, Overstock, Home Depot, Lowe’s, Costco and Ace Hardware.  We also sell our products direct to the consumer through our website and our current international channels are expanding.  For a complete list of international retailers please contact Customer Service.
settings.accordion_title_4: Q: I want to sell your products. Can I be a dealer?
settings.accordion_content_4: We have programs for resellers, both stores and online. Please use the Contact Us form to send us your inquiry.
settings.accordion_title_5: Q: Your products are made from wood. Do you protect the environment?
settings.accordion_content_5: Yes we do, as environmental preservation is very important to us. First, we participate in the Sustainable Forest program which means that four saplings are planted for each tree removed to make our sets. Also, we use a water-based treatment on our wood as we prepare it for boxing. The treatment looks great, it is environment-friendly, and is non-toxic for the kiddos.
settings.accordion_title_6: Q: Where are your products made?
settings.accordion_content_6: While some of our products are made here in the US, most are made in China under contract to us and to our specifications.

settings.accordion_title_1: Q: Can I use sand or mulch for the base of the play set?
settings.accordion_content_1: Sand, mulch, and other soft materials are great for the ground under the play set area. However, the play set should NOT rest on these materials. You MUST make sure the ground is level and firm. You must also secure the set with stakes provided. Once the play set is securely resting on these solid footings, then you can surround it with your favorite soft material.
settings.accordion_title_2: Q: How much area is required for the play set?
settings.accordion_content_2: We recommend a 6 foot perimeter around the set and above it for maximum protection against interference with other yard items.
settings.accordion_title_3: Q: How do I get started assembling the set?
settings.accordion_content_3: We STRONGLY recommend taking out all the parts and laying them on the ground or garage floor before you assemble anything. Match the parts with the parts list in the manual and mark them. This will also help you identify any parts that might be missing. Also, read through your owner’s manual from beginning to end to understand the flow of assembly, this will save you confusion and time. Once everything is laid out, then begin assembling step by step from the manual.
settings.accordion_title_4: Q: I can't find my manual. How can I get another one?
settings.accordion_content_4: We publish all the manuals on the website on their respective product pages and in our manuals library. When you click on the link for manual you'll see it open and then you have the chance to save it to your computer or print it. Our manuals are published in Adobe Acrobat format. If you do not have Acrobat you can download it FREE from Adobe's site: www.adobe.com.
settings.accordion_title_5: Q: Can I use a service to assemble my play set?
settings.accordion_content_5: Many customers contract a service to assemble their set. However, PLEASE make sure YOU inventory all parts FIRST, before the contractor begins any work! If any parts are missing, go to our Support page and follow the prompts to order the parts. We'll send them to you free of charge. We are not responsible for ANY service fees for any reason.
settings.accordion_title_6: Q: Do you recommend an assembly service?
settings.accordion_content_6: Yes. GoConfigure can put together your play or patio item for you. Bundle pricing is available as an option for most products on our website. If you need pricing for a set you bought without assembly you can call (888) 888-5424.
settings.accordion_title_7: Q: The swing beam end beam is not straight up and down.
settings.accordion_content_7: This is normal. The end of the swing beam does not make a 90* angle with the ground or the swing beam itself.

settings.accordion_title_1: Q: Do you charge a restocking fee?
settings.accordion_content_1: Yes. We charge a 15% restocking fee. This is because play sets are heavy, large, and cost a lot to ship back and forth. We want you to be satisfied, but we do not want you to purchase without being absolutely sure this is what you want.
settings.accordion_title_2: Q: What is your return policy?
settings.accordion_content_2: Please read our return policy carefully. It explains very important purchasing, shipping, and return policy information to which you must agree before we can ship your play set. If you buy from us over the telephone, you implicitly agree to these terms and conditions as part of your purchase.
settings.accordion_title_3: Q: What if I bought my products from [your favorite retailer]?
settings.accordion_content_3: Then you should contact the company from who you purchased your play set for return policies and information. We will not accept any returns that do not have an RMA number on them that WE issued. If you ship us something without an RMA number we issued, we will refuse the shipment and it will come back to you at your expense.
settings.accordion_title_4: Q: How do I return something?
settings.accordion_content_4: Write us using our Support Page and ask for an RMA number. We will not accept any returns without a RMA number. We allow you to return your purchase within 30 days of receipt as long as you follow the instructions and agree to the Terms and Conditions document.

settings.accordion_title_1: Q: How long will it take to get my item?
settings.accordion_content_1: Our play sets, gazebos and pergolas are heavy and must be shipped by truck. It will take 1-2 days to process your order and get it ready to go on board the truck. Once on the truck it will take 7-15 days for the play set to ship. We will send you an email with the tracking number so you can keep tabs on your shipment and plan for its arrival. Many playhouses, accessories and other smaller items ship via package express - generally FedEx. On each product page you can click on "Check Arrival Dates" for estemated shipping times.
settings.accordion_title_2: Q: Are items always in stock?
settings.accordion_content_2: If the "Add to Cart" button is visible the product is in stock otherwise you will see an out of stock notice.
settings.accordion_title_3: Q: How big are the boxes?
settings.accordion_content_3: Box dimensions vary and can be found on the product pages.
settings.accordion_title_4: Q: If I order more than one product will they all arrive together?
settings.accordion_content_4: Probably not. This is because play sets ship from a different warehouse than accessories, etc. So just like Amazon and others, you may get your shipment at different times separated by a few days or more.
settings.accordion_content_5: Yes, shipping is included in the price.

settings.accordion_title_1: Q: What if a part is missing?
settings.accordion_content_1: If you find that a part is missing or parts are broken, go to the replacement parts ordering page. This will lead you through the process for ordering parts online and/or getting your part requirements to the correct person. Using this method is much faster and more efficient for you than attempting to call Customer Service. Please use the website anywhere you can.
settings.accordion_title_2: Q: What is the warranty on your play sets?
settings.accordion_content_2: The warranties vary by play set and brand. Please open the assembly manual for the play set of choice and you'll find the warranty information in the last few pages of the manual.
settings.accordion_title_3: Q: I have an older play set. Do you have parts for it?
settings.accordion_content_3: In many cases we still have parts for older play sets. Please follow the procedure under Service and Support.
settings.accordion_title_4: Q: Some of the wood is cracked. Is this normal?
settings.accordion_content_4: Yes. Cedar is naturally resistant to decay and rot. However, surface cracks can develop as it weathers and this is perfectly normal. It does not affect the strength of the wood.
settings.accordion_title_5: Q: How long will it take to get parts?
settings.accordion_content_5: We try to ship within 48 hours of your parts order and we ship using ground service so it can be anywhere from 4 days to 10 days, depending on your proximity to southeast Kansas. If a part is not in stock and needs to be made, it can take a few days longer.
settings.accordion_content_6: We ship parts via either package express or common carrier depending on the size. We use ground service and do not ship expedited for any reason.

settings.page_content: ContentNote: Our office is closed most major US holidays.

At Backyard Discovery, we are united by a common goal of getting kids to flex their muscles and activate their imaginations through outdoor play. From our skilled craftsmen and women, engineers, customer service experts, warehouse managers, marketers, financial folks and beyond. If you share our values of enabling quality outdoor moments for families, we’d love to hear from you.

We work in a fast-paced and challenging environment. Our atmosphere is fun and casual. We are a customer service organization and our success depends on our people. We look for people who are resilient and thrive in a frequently changing environment. We encourage our employees to share their ideas and experiences to improve the way we do business.

With Go Configure, we bring you 18 years of experience right to your doorstep. We service a wide array of indoor and outdoor recreation products that most consumers don’t have the time or ability to deliver & install themselves. We do the heavy lifting, so you don’t have to!

Although your GoConfigure team will do all the heavy lifting, there are a few things we ask you do to ensure your yard and your set are ready for a quick and easy installation. Click below to download the easy-to-follow one sheet that explains all you need to know about scheduling and preparing for your installation.

settings.title: The Backyard Experts
settings.col1_content: Backyard Discovery has been offering a wide array of ready-to-assemble outdoor play and patio structures for over 35 years! Featured in our "Play" category are swing sets, playhouses, elevated play sets and slides aimed to delight children of varying age ranges. Our "Patio" category high-lights wooden and metal pergolas, grill gazebos, cabana pergolas and gazebos. The "Patio Accents" offerings will enhance any outdoor space with items such as our coolers, potting table, porch swings, Farmhouse bench and planters. Whether you're looking to relax, play or entertain; Backyard Discovery has you covered as your outdoor experts!
settings.col2_content: Backyard Discovery is proud to partner with Roc Solid Foundation. For over a decade Roc Solid has been committed to building hope for kids fighting cancer by offering opportunities for them to do what they do best: PLAY. By providing playsets to families fighting pediatric cancer, Roc Solid Foundation helps to create a safe haven for play that represents an escape from the reality of their cancer battle. But most importantly these playsets signify hope for the future.

settings.jumbotron-rte: Most of our playsets, playhouses, and pergolas can be purchased with assembly included using our GoConfigure service. GoConfigure will get your family up and running (and playing) in no time.

settings.title: The Backyard Discovery Difference
settings.text:
From carefully selected materials to solid engineering to unbeatable performance in every kind of weather, dive into the details that set us apart.

  • PRO-TECT® Certification on every gazebo and pergola
  • Materials selected for the highest performance and durability
  • Attractive designs that show strength is style
  • Outstanding customer services for the lifespan of your product
